body.para: There are several ways that you can set project properties in Visual Studio:

list.li: There is a <Myprojectname> Properties menu option in the Project Menu
There is a context menu option "Properties" on the project icons in the Solution Explorer
By choosing the context menu option "Open" on the Properties folder below the Project Icon in the Solution Explorer.

body.para: All these options do the same and open the project properties dialog. This dialog has several pages.
